attributes.action: Ban Mobile Phones from being used in the House of Commons.
attributes.background: After watching countless MPs on their phones during crucial debates in the house of commons, I think enough is enough! In any other work place mobile phones are not allowed to be used, so why should it be different for MPs! Surely they can wait until they leave?

rejection.details:
We're not sure if you're concerned about use of phones in the House of Commons chamber or more widely in the House of Commons as a workplace. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like to happen. There's already a petition about use of social media during debates in the House of Commons. You might like to sign this petition. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272858
